name: mikroe.click.expand12
short_description: Expand 12 Click is a compact add-on board that contains a multi-port I/O expander. This board features the MAX7300, a general-purpose I/O expander providing remote I/O expansion for most MCUâ€™s families from Maxim Integrated, now part of Analog Devices. The MAX7300 comes in a 28-port configuration and allows easy addition of I/O through a standard I2C serial interface. Each port is user-configurable to either a logic input or logic output, capable of sinking 10mA and sourcing 4.5mA.
